aligned_molecules_optical_mapping_id.description:
identifier for aligned_molecules_optical_mapping (primary key)

Notes: molecule_file_optical_mapping + alignment indicator

molecule_file_optical_mapping_id.description: identifier for molecule file used for this alignment

aligned_molecules_optical_mapping_file.description: Location of molecule to reference alignment file

aligned_molecules_optical_mapping_index_.description: Location of molecule to reference alignment index file

md5sum.description: md5 checksum for aligned molecules .bam file

reference_length.description: Total length of reference sequence (in base pairs)

bionano_reference.description: The bionano internal cmap name of the reference genome this sample was aligned to

software_interface_version.description: Bionano Access Version (software used for alignment)

number_molecules_aligned.description: The number of molecules after filtering (≥ 150 kbp) that align to the in silico digested reference file (.cmap), e.g. GRCh37 or GRCh38

fraction_molecules_aligned.description: The proportion of filtered molecules that align to the consensus genome maps (assembly only).

effective_reference_coverage.description: The total length of molecules divided by the length of the reference or consensus assembled maps after de novo assembly.

average_confidence.description: The average alignment score for all the molecules that align to the reference.

analysis_details.description: brief description of the analysis pipeline used for producing the file; perhaps a DOI or link to something like a WDL file or github repository

quality_issues.description: describe if there are any QC issues that would be important to note
